title: (x) Watson Roofing Inc. - Century Schoolbook {Mark S}
author: antiuser

comments.content: I think it's just plain old [Century Schoolbook](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518052040/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/century-schoolbook/century-schoolbook/testdrive.html?s=WatsonRoofingInc.&p=60). It might be artificially bolded a bit.
I think you're right, Mark. It's too heavy to be the normal weight yet too light for a bold...
